completed.details: 35KB deep-dive: 5 automated SaaS ideas (95%+ automation). Top pick: Construction Project Documentation AI ($10K-30K MRR). Full tech stacks, costs, revenue projections, 12-month timelines.
Researched what makes videos look professional. Recommended Pictory+VA hybrid ($6-19/video) for 5-10x quality improvement. Alternative: Runway Gen-4 AI video ($1.50/video).
Brutal truth: Shorts RPM too low ($0.05-0.30). Long-form 33-100x better. Scott Smith case study: $200k/mo with faceless channels. Recommended pivot to long-form.
Built batch_create_shorts.py, topics-batch-1.json (10 ideas), NEXT-ACTIONS.md. Improved script prompts for better hooks.
Found proven business models: Agency services ($2k-10k+/mo), Viral content ($100-10k/mo), YouTube automation. Construction+Agency identified as best opportunity.
Hybrid approach (70% AI, 30% human) beats full automation. Documented proven tool stacks and realistic revenue timelines.
